pages.text: There are different types of Gems, each obtainable inside the Vault as $(l)ores$() or as individual Gems $(l)in chests.$() $(br2)Ores can be mined and are affected by $(l)Fortune$(). 1 Gem is guaranteed when $(l)smelted$().

Four Gems of the same type can be combined to create a $(l)perfect$() version of the Gem, which are used in various modded recipes. Some even allow to be combined further into Extraorginary Gems. Combining a Perfect Alexandrite gem with unique gems creates a $(l)Gemstone$(). $(br2)Gemstones are used to create $(l)Jewels$() to use in Vault Pickaxes $(l)

A $(l)POG$() is an item made by combining all $(l)legendary gems$(). It is used in higher tier crafting recipes.
Combining four pogs with an Extraordinary Echo gem creates An $(l)Echo POG$(). Echo Pogs are used in high tier crafting recipes.

An $(l)Omega POG$() is crafted by combining all $(l)legendary gem chunks$(). It is used in end-game crafting recipes. $(br2)It also contains a high pog content, which can be used to show off to your fellow players.
